title: Missing Arabic font
description: Arabic text not rendering correctly due to missing font support. GitHub issue #12.

title: Display reposts & quotes counts
description: Show repost and quote counts on rendered notes. GitHub issue #34.

title: Fix deadlock
description: Deadlock occurring in the application. GitHub issue #24.

title: Display zap tally
description: Show total zap amount on rendered notes. GitHub issue #8.

title: Display reply details/context
description: Show who a note is replying to with context from the parent note. GitHub issue #42.

title: Create profile page
description: Full profile page rendering with user info, recent notes, etc. GitHub issue #1.

title: Display reactions
description: Show reaction counts (likes/custom reactions) on rendered notes. GitHub issue #33.

title: Add 'note seen on relays' display
description: Show which relays a note was seen on. GitHub issue #9.

title: Share hashtag feed externally
description: Render a feed of notes for a given hashtag. GitHub issue #15.

title: On-demand fetching for parent events
description: Fetch parent events from relays when rendering a reply, so thread context can be displayed even if the parent isn't cached. GitHub issue #48.

title: Zap a notecrumb
description: Allow users to zap directly from the notecrumbs page. GitHub issue #7.

title: Render entire threads
description: Display full thread context when viewing a note. Show parent notes and replies in a threaded view. GitHub issue #14.

title: NIP-05 notecrumbs explorer
description: Browse notecrumbs via NIP-05 identifiers. GitHub issue #18.

title: Longform: show article name by author name
description: Change naddr bech32 strings to human-readable 'Article name by author name' format. GitHub issue #47.

title: Return 404 instead of 502 for missing notes
description: When a note can't be found, return 404 Not Found instead of 502 Bad Gateway. GitHub issue #25.

title: Fix nostrich on nostr preview
description: Nostrich avatar/icon not displaying correctly in previews. GitHub issue #56.

title: URL pills
description: Render URLs as styled pill/chip elements instead of raw links. GitHub issue #50.

title: Persistent relay pool
description: Keep relay connections alive across requests instead of reconnecting each time. GitHub issue #21.

title: Add name/nip-05 of poster
description: Display poster's name and NIP-05 identifier on note previews. GitHub issue #5.

title: Render video on notecrumbs
description: Display video content in note previews. GitHub issue #23.
